√dhū 'shake'

present: [5.] dhūnóti  dhūnuté etc. V.+  dhunoti  dhunute etc.   -- [2.] dhuváte (3p.)  dhuvāná   -- [6.] dhuvati etc.  dhūvet   -- [9.] dhunīyāt   -- dhunet?  

perfect: dudhāva etc. E.+  dudhuve  dudhuvīta  dūdhot  

aorist: [4.] adhūṣṭa  adhūṣata  adhoṣṭa   -- [5.] adhāvīt  adhuvīt  adhaviṣṭa  

future: [1.] dhaviṣyati  dhaviṣyate  dhoṣyati  dhoṣyate   -- [2.] dhavitā  dhotā  

verbal: dhūtá V.+  dhuta E.+  dhūna  dhavitum  dhūtvā  -dhū́ya AV.+  

secondary: passive: dhūyáte etc. AV.+  dhūyant   -- intensive: dodhavīti etc.  dodhūyate etc.  davidhu-  davidhāva   -- desiderative: dudhūṣa-   -- causative: dhūnayati  dhūnayate etc. E.+  dhāvayati  

derivatives: -dhu  -dhava RV.  -dhavana B.S.  -dhāva B.  dhavitavyà ÇB.  dhavítra B.S.  dhuvaka JB.  dhúvana B.S.  dhū́ti RV.  -dhuti C.  dhúni? V.B.  dhūnana E.+
